subScenes.name: 开场问候
subScenes.description: 面试官礼貌开场，引导自我介绍

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, thanks for coming in today. Could you start by telling me a bit about yourself?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你好，感谢你今天来，能先简单介绍一下自己吗？

responses.text: Sure! I'm a marketing professional with 3 years of experience in digital campaigns.
responses.text_cn: 当然！我是一名有三年数字营销经验的市场专员。

responses.text: Yeah, I've been working in sales for a while now and I'm pretty good at closing deals.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，我做销售好几年了，特别擅长签单。

responses.text: I'm a recent grad in business, eager to learn and contribute.
responses.text_cn: 我是刚毕业的商科生，想学习并贡献力量。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体经验开头，避免空泛描述

subScenes.name: 经验聚焦
subScenes.description: 面试官追问核心工作经历

qaPairs.speakerText: You mentioned you led a team project—what was your biggest challenge?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你提到带过团队项目，最大的挑战是什么？

responses.text: Getting everyone on the same page was tough, but I set weekly check-ins and it really helped.
responses.text_cn: 让大家步调一致很难，但我设了周会，效果很好。

responses.text: Honestly? Communication. We fixed it by switching to Slack.
responses.text_cn: 说实话，是沟通问题，后来改用Slack解决了。

responses.text: It was time management—I learned to prioritize better.
responses.text_cn: 是时间管理，我学会了更合理地优先排序。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用STAR原则回答，突出解决能力

qaPairs.speakerText: How did that experience make you better at your job?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这段经历让你在工作中变得更好了吗？

responses.text: I became way more organized—I now plan everything two weeks ahead.
responses.text_cn: 我变得更有条理了，现在提前两周规划所有事。

responses.text: I stopped guessing and started using data to make decisions.
responses.text_cn: 我不再凭感觉，改用数据做决策。

responses.text: It taught me to speak up when things go off track.
responses.text_cn: 它让我学会在出问题时及时发声。

qaPairs.usageNote: 强调成长与行为改变，而非单纯成果

subScenes.name: 优势表达
subScenes.description: 面试官引导你说明核心竞争力

qaPairs.speakerText: What do you think sets you apart from other candidates?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你觉得你和别人比有什么特别之处？

responses.text: I combine strong analytics skills with real empathy—I understand both data and people.
responses.text_cn: 我兼具数据分析能力和同理心，懂数据也懂人。

responses.text: I'm super reliable—I never miss deadlines, even under pressure.
responses.text_cn: 我超靠谱，压力再大也从不拖延。

responses.text: I learn fast—I picked up Python in a month for my last project.
responses.text_cn: 我学得快，上个项目一个月就学会了Python。

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体技能+实例证明优势，别空喊

subScenes.name: 确认意向
subScenes.description: 面试官确认你对岗位的兴趣与适配度

qaPairs.speakerText: Why do you want to work here specifically?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你为什么特别想来我们公司？

responses.text: I admire your focus on innovation—I've always wanted to work where ideas actually get implemented.
responses.text_cn: 我欣赏你们对创新的重视，我一直想在能落地想法的地方工作。

responses.text: Your culture seems way more open than other places I've seen—I'd thrive here.
responses.text_cn: 你们的文化比其他公司更开放，我在这里会发挥更好。

responses.text: I've followed your growth—this role is the perfect next step.
responses.text_cn: 我关注你们的发展，这个职位是我理想的下一站。

qaPairs.usageNote: 结合公司特点，展现做过功课

subScenes.name: 结束道别
subScenes.description: 面试官收尾，询问是否有问题

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, thanks for sharing all that. Do you have any questions for me?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好的，谢谢你分享这些，你有什么问题问我吗？

responses.text: Yes—what does success look like in this role in the first 90 days?
responses.text_cn: 有，这个岗位头90天的成功标准是什么？

responses.text: Not right now, but I'm really excited about this opportunity.
responses.text_cn: 现在没有，但我对这个机会非常期待。

responses.text: Just one—how's the team collaboration usually structured?
responses.text_cn: 就一个，团队协作一般是怎样的？

qaPairs.usageNote: 哪怕没问，也要表达感谢和兴趣
